channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'Many of them will die': Hammer drops on USAID with organizations left reeling
item.description: After a month of fits and starts, a final hammer came down on U.S. international aid Wednesday night.

item.title: Trump, Zelenskyy hold high-stakes summit amid tensions over peace talks with Putin
item.description: The two leaders are set to sign a deal giving U.S. access to Ukraine's minerals.
